channel.title: ChaosScape - JaGeX's Worst Nightmare (New)
channel.description:
[center][b]Welcome to the new ChaosScape development, here's the original, outdated version- Credits to I Vain I for original:[/b][/center]
[quote="I Vain I"][img]http://chaosscape.net/images/media/development.png[/img][center]Welcome to the ChaosScape 317 project development thread. Our team consists of many wonderful coders, helpers, and assistants, all of which do a wonderful job.
Though, our project doesn't just consist of a RuneScape Private Server. We have the whole package. [b]If you wish to join this development team, you may apply here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,444626.0.html[/b]
We have will be releasing our server, under the GPL licensing to the public, allowing this server to be more widely used, to allow many more coders to adapt to the better coding conventions and methods. [/center] So far what our site has:
[ul][li]Standard 317 source[/li] [li]MySQL-integrated 317 source[/li] [li]TeamSpeak server[/li] [li]Extremely similar RuneScape-styled forums[/li] [li]Very complex website-Grand Exchange system. (Not completely finished, though will be soon)[/li][/ul]
Pictures: [img]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/2233/homerd.png[/img] The new home page(:
[img]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/8475/registery.png[/img] The register users page(:
[img]http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/4677/onlineo.png[/img] Members currently online(:
[img]http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/4353/membermt.png[/img] All members currently registered(:
[img]http://img802.imageshack.us/img802/8856/guest.png[/img] Guest book(:
[img]http://img808.imageshack.us/img808/7858/forumhome.png[/img] New Forums(:
[img]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/6528/forumk.png[/img] Forums again(:
[img]http://img203.imageshack.us/img203/9100/admincpm.png[/img] Admin Control Panel (Manage all forum categories, posts, users, home page stuff (the article of week, recent announcements, etc))
[img]http://i32.tinypic.com/2e4zvrn.png[/img] Grand Exchange(:
The Grand Exchange is being hand-typed by me, I Vain I, and was made using RuneScape's 2010 CSS with the 2007-2008 Website template.
The images do not show, as they haven't been dumped into the database yet; though, this will be working shortly.
The template is nearly finished, and each 'part' is handled in a different file. For instance, all searching for items/scanning/reading the database is handled in search.php.
All of the methods pertaining to the rising of item prices, is all handled in rise.php.
It's a very detailed coding, and the server side methods will be fixed soon (will add a supply/demand system to the server and change the item price to a static integer, to be able to change itself).
Also, working on the algorithm to find the rise/fall percentages, store up to 180 days of the item's last price changes, and a graphing method.
Will add more information on this project later, as I must get back to the Grand Exchange. :)[/quote]
[center]Hi I'm Mod Pat of ChaosScape, here to give you some up to date info on whats going on. Be sure to check out the link in the original thread above! [b] We have entered beta today![/b][/center]
I will hopefully get some screenshots up here soon.
[center]Here's a brief overlook of recent updates:
-Beta was launched by the ChaosScape development team -Agility was added by Mod Pat -Highscores was completed and can be found on the main site by Mod Carter -Website graphics updated by Mod Carter -New forum topics/options by Mod Justo -Various website updates by Mod Justo and Devast8a -Miscellaneous server updates by Mod Jmood, Mod Adam, Mod Siver, and Mod Pat -Mining completed by Mod Siver -Woodcutting completed by Mod Siver -Fishing completed by Mod Pat [/center]
[hr] [center][b][u]Current Staff List:[/u][/b] [b]Owner[/b] Mod Carter
[b]Site Development Team[/b] Mod Carter Team DJ (Devast8a and Justo) Mod Hazmatt
[b]Server Development Team[/b] Mod Siver (Lead Server & Client Developer) Mod Jmood Mod Pat Mod Thomas Mod Adam
[b]Moderator Team[/b] Mod Travis (Senior Staff) Mod Dylan (Ventrilo/TeamSpeak) Mod Ryan (Global Mod) Mod Aron (Forum Editor/In-game Staff) Mod Damien (Global Mod) Mod Stark (Global Mod) Mod Czarek (Global Mod) [/center] Check out our development team thread for even more info, the link is in the quote. Thanks for viewing the ChaosScape thread, new screenshots coming soon.

item.description:
@Priv_Serv_Man wrote:

[center]Welcome to the new ChaosScape development, here’s the original, outdated version- Credits to I Vain I for original:[/center]

[quote=“I Vain I”][center]Welcome to the ChaosScape 317 project development thread.
Our team consists of many wonderful coders, helpers, and assistants, all of which do a wonderful job.

Though, our project doesn’t just consist of a RuneScape Private Server.
We have the whole package.
If you wish to join this development team, you may apply here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,444626.0.html

We have will be releasing our server, under the GPL licensing to the public, allowing this server to be more widely used, to allow many more coders to adapt to the better coding conventions and methods.
[/center]
So far what our site has:

[ul][li]Standard 317 source[/li]
[li]MySQL-integrated 317 source[/li]
[li]TeamSpeak server[/li]
[li]Extremely similar RuneScape-styled forums[/li]
[li]Very complex website-Grand Exchange system. (Not completely finished, though will be soon)[/li][/ul]

Pictures:

The new home page(:


The register users page(:


Members currently online(:


All members currently registered(:


Guest book(:


New Forums(:


Forums again(:


Admin Control Panel (Manage all forum categories, posts, users, home page stuff (the article of week, recent announcements, etc))

2e4zvrn.png997×1217

Grand Exchange(:

The Grand Exchange is being hand-typed by me, I Vain I, and was made using RuneScape’s 2010 CSS with the 2007-2008 Website template.

The images do not show, as they haven’t been dumped into the database yet; though, this will be working shortly.

The template is nearly finished, and each ‘part’ is handled in a different file.
For instance, all searching for items/scanning/reading the database is handled in search.php.

All of the methods pertaining to the rising of item prices, is all handled in rise.php.

It’s a very detailed coding, and the server side methods will be fixed soon (will add a supply/demand system to the server and change the item price to a static integer, to be able to change itself).

Also, working on the algorithm to find the rise/fall percentages, store up to 180 days of the item’s last price changes, and a graphing method.

Will add more information on this project later, as I must get back to the Grand Exchange. :)[/quote]

[center]Hi I’m Mod Pat of ChaosScape, here to give you some up to date info on whats going on. Be sure to check out the link in the original thread above!

We have entered beta today![/center]

I will hopefully get some screenshots up here soon.

[center]Here’s a brief overlook of recent updates:

-Beta was launched by the ChaosScape development team
-Agility was added by Mod Pat
-Highscores was completed and can be found on the main site by Mod Carter
-Website graphics updated by Mod Carter
-New forum topics/options by Mod Justo
-Various website updates by Mod Justo and Devast8a
-Miscellaneous server updates by Mod Jmood, Mod Adam, Mod Siver, and Mod Pat
-Mining completed by Mod Siver
-Woodcutting completed by Mod Siver
-Fishing completed by Mod Pat
[/center]
